divs: sighting detailsi am not certain of the exact date. i know it was after sept. 15th 2008 because i got back from my honeymoon on the 14th. it was also before nov. 21st 2008 because that is when i moved into our home in west virginia. it was only around 7:30 pm and it was already quite dark but it was rather warm outside so i believe it was mid october. i was living with my wife at my in laws house and shortly after arriving home from work we left to go to leesburg to get dog food for our dogs. on our way home it was quite dark and as we came over a hill leaving leesburg heading west on route 7 there was a very bright light just over the tree line. i remember thinking that it was a large commercial airplane like a 747 at first. dulles is right around the corner(10-15 miles) but i thought the plane was much to low to be going there. also there is a leesburg airport but i thought the runways there are much to small for an aircraft of that size. thoughts were racing through my head and my next thought was either it was making an emergency landing on route 7 or it was hijacked like 9\11 since we were so close to dc. as we got closer i realized it was moving very slow. the one bright light started to become clear it was multiple lights. it was a disk shaped aircraft. lights around the bottom with one light in the center. it was heading dead east parallel with the road. 200 yards north of the road at an altitude of 250-500 feet. it was about 50 feet in diameter. as we pulled up next to it it had come to a stop and was hovering over some houses. my wife was driving and had slowed to 25-30 mph on the highway to look at it. i rolled down my window and turned off the stereo to listen for it. nothing. no sound what so ever. neither of us had our phones on us so we couldn't take a pic. i asked astoundingly if she was seeing what i was seeing. she said no. i said "it is right above us, look, it is right there". she said no again. when i took my eyes off it to look at her i realized she was white as a ghost, eyes forward, hands gripping the wheel and was sweating. she was scared of what she was seeing. as we went passed it it started moving south over the road, only moving 10-20 mph. it passed directly behind the car. aside from the silence another thing i found weird was when it moved it didn't gyrate about an axis. it stayed level not rotating at all. i talked my wife into turning around at the next exit (1\4 mile up the road) to look for it but when we got back, it was gone. the craziest thing i ever saw. when we got home i immediately started calling people telling them what i had seen. some believed me, some didn't. i called my dad because he was just south of us and told him to look for it in the sky. he didn't see anything that night. i am reporting this because i want to find out if anyone else saw this. there were other cars on the road and everyone of them slowed down to the same speed as us. someone else has to have seen this.
Summary: Disc, slow moving, silent, flying low then gone.
